title: Remove password authentication and implement username-only login with admin display name support

requirements.text: Remove password field from login page - implement username-only authentication where users enter only their username to log in
acceptanceCriteria: Login page displays only username input field, no password field
Users can successfully authenticate with username only
Backend authentication logic updated to validate username without password

requirements.text: Allow guests to login with any username except 'Alaie' - prevent guests from using the reserved admin username

quotes: مهمان‌ها: نام کاربری می‌تواند هر چیزی باشد (به جز 'Alaie')

acceptanceCriteria: Guest users can login with any username that is not 'Alaie'
Attempting to login as guest with username 'Alaie' is blocked with appropriate error message
Backend validates that 'Alaie' username is reserved for admin access only

requirements.text: Restrict admin login to username 'Alaie' only - admins can only login when username is exactly 'Alaie'

quotes: فقط با نام کاربری 'Alaie' می‌توانند وارد شوند

acceptanceCriteria: Admin role is automatically assigned when username is 'Alaie'
Admin features and permissions are only available to users logged in as 'Alaie'
Backend role detection logic identifies admin based solely on username being 'Alaie'

requirements.text: Add Display Name field in login page for admins only - show display name input field when username is 'Alaie' to allow admins to set their display name during login

quotes: برای مدیران نیز قسمت display  در قسمت ورودی بزار تا با  آن اسمشان را در چت و کنار پیام و پروفایل تغییر بدن

acceptanceCriteria: Display Name input field appears on login page when username entered is 'Alaie'
Display Name field is hidden for all other usernames (guest login)
Admin can set their display name during login which is saved to their profile
Display Name is optional - admin can login without entering it

requirements.text: Display admin's Display Name in chat messages, profile, and conversation list - show the admin's chosen display name instead of username 'Alaie' throughout the application

quotes: با  آن اسمشان را در چت و کنار پیام و پروفایل تغییر بدن

acceptanceCriteria: Admin's display name appears next to their messages in chat interface
Admin's display name is shown in their profile view
Admin's display name appears in conversation list
If no display name is set, fall back to showing username 'Alaie'

constraints: Maintain existing admin role detection and permissions system
Preserve existing message history and user profiles during authentication changes
Keep backend single-actor architecture in main.mo
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui
nonGoals: Adding password recovery or reset functionality
Creating user registration or signup flow
Adding ability for guests to set display names
Allowing admins to use usernames other than 'Alaie'
